ComicInfo.Summary:
Robyn has been taken in by a mysterious captor, but they will soon show themselves as anything but a mystery—and may well prove useful in Robyn’s quest to clear her name. Meanwhile, the true origins (and purpose) of the Vigilante Hunter Squad, as well as Mayor Nyguen’s identity, are revealed, and it all will spell certain doom for the Big Apple. Will Robyn, be able to enlist the help of the creatures, crazies and criminals of the Underground, or will they enlist her into an early grave?
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ A | Cover A | Drew Edward Johnson & Ivan Nunes | 1 | B | Cover B | Sheldon Goh & Hedwin Zaldivar | 2 | C | Cover C | Alfredo Reyes & Ylenia Di Napoli | 3 | D | Cover D | Igor Vitorino & Ivan Nunes | 4 | E | Collectors Club Crystal Anniversary Collectible Variant Cover, Limited to 250 | Paul Green (a) & Ula Mos (c) | Missing | F | Collectors Club Collectible Variant Cover, Limited to 125 | Paul Green (a) & Ula Mos (c) | Missing | G | Collectors Club Collectible Variant Cover, Limited to 100 | Paul Green (a) & Ula Mos (c) | Missing | H | VIP Collectible Variant Cover, Limited to 100 | Sun Khamunaki | Missing |
